suppress.notes: False Positives CVE-2016-3094 - affected class is PlainSaslServer.java, which qpid-jms-client does not have CVE-2022-1471 - SnakeYaml's Constructor() class does not restrict types which can be instantiated during deserialization, spring uses SafeConstructor which is the recommended workaround CVE-2022-40705 - see https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/5543 CVE-2022-45688 - A stack overflow in the XML.toJSONObject component of hutool-json, hutool is not in the dependencies list when ./gradlew dependencies is run CVE-2023-34411 CVE-2023-35116 - Not believed to be a valid vulnerability - see https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972
